attributes.action: make it illegal for any taxpayer pounds to be paid to the Hindu population of this country as a result of DEFRA carrying out the lawful culling of their religiously symbolic bull.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This government has a track record of using taxpayer pounds to cover up and pay the financial consequences of  failings and criminal activities by individuals in government departments and/or government established agencies.  If it is found that a DEFRA official or an RSPCA official acted unlawfully or criminally then any compensation ordered to be paid should be paid by that individual, personally, and NOT by law-abiding taxpayers like me.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
